objectives: Critically evaluate scholarly perspectives on synthetic biology
learning_style_adaptations: Use of diagrams, charts, and mind maps

multiple_intelligences.linguistic: Write a story or essay about synthetic biology
multiple_intelligences.logical_mathematical: Analyze patterns and create logical arguments about synthetic biology
multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of synthetic biology
multiple_intelligences.bodily_kinesthetic: Role-play or act out scenarios related to synthetic biology
multiple_intelligences.musical: Create a song or rhythm exercise about synthetic biology
multiple_intelligences.interpersonal: Collaborate in groups to discuss synthetic biology
multiple_intelligences.intrapersonal: Reflect individually on personal connection to synthetic biology
multiple_intelligences.naturalistic: Categorize and classify concepts related to synthetic biology

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about synthetic biology
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about synthetic biology
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about synthetic biology

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference
process.choice: Multiple activity options aligned with learning style

differentiation.environment: Well-lit space with visual displays and projection capabilities

warm_up.description: Students examine images related to synthetic biology and discuss

main_activities.learning_style_adaptation: Use of diagrams, charts, and mind maps
main_activities.description: Students receive information about synthetic biology through visual modality
Students practice language related to synthetic biology using visual approach
Students produce original content about synthetic biology demonstrating advanced thinking

discussion_prompts: What are the implications of synthetic biology for society?
How would you design a better approach to synthetic biology?
What criteria would you use to evaluate synthetic biology?

vocabulary_support.tier_2: Academic and topic-specific words for synthetic biology
vocabulary_support.tier_3: Domain-specific technical terms related to synthetic biology

homework_options.required: Core assignment at advanced level using visual approach

teacher_notes.grouping_suggestions: Flexible grouping based on readiness and interest
teacher_notes.time_management: Build in flexibility for different pacing needs

common_difficulties: Students may lack background knowledge about synthetic biology
Vocabulary may be challenging for some students
Some students may need more processing time
methodology: UDL + Differentiated Instruction + CLT + Multiple Intelligences
references: CAST Universal Design for Learning Guidelines
